name: Malefic Shooting Quasar Dragon
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Shooting Quasar Dragon" from your Extra Deck. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects. Other monsters you control cannot decalre an attack. If there is no face-up Field Spell Card on the field, destroy this card.
